mapper.delete: DELETE FROM jjim WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND isbn = #{isbn}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, b.isbn, b.book_title, (SELECT LISTAGG(ba.author, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ba.author) FROM book_author ba WHERE ba.isbn = b.isbn) AS authors, b.price, b.publisher, b.pub_date, b.image_name, bc.cat_id -- book_categories FROM book b LEFT JOIN book_categories bc ON b.isbn = bc.isbn WHERE b.isbn IN ( SELECT j.isbn FROM jjim j WHERE j.user_id = #{user_id} ) ORDER BY b.pub_date DESC ) a WHERE a.rn > #{start} AND a.rn <= #{end} ORDER BY a.rn
select count(*) from jjim where user_id=#{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select cat_name from categories where cat_id=#{cat_id}
